APPENDIX TO THE CONGRESSIONAL GLOBE.
[April 1,
Ho. op Reps.
National Debt, &c.—Mr. Lawrence.
41st Cong 2d Sess.
Table exhibiting the amount of the various denominations of legal-tender notes and temporary loans outstanding, and the cash in the United
States Treasury, and the banknotes outstanding at various dates since July 1, 1862.
[Each amount is made up to and includes the date of the day preceding that given in tho margin.]
